longBusinessSummary: The Nisshin OilliO Group,Ltd. engages in oil and fat, processed food and material, fine chemicals, and other businesses in Japan, Malaysia, China, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers edible oil for use in household, commercial, and food processing applications and foods for the elderly and nursing care patients, etc. It also provides margarines and shortenings, processed palm oil products, oils and fats for chocolates, etc.; and fine chemicals, including medium-chain triglycerides, food ingredients, chemical products, and raw materials for cosmetics, etc. In addition, the company offers fat and meal, and oilseed meal; and processed food and material, such as seasoning, functional materials and foods, and soybean materials and food. Further, it is involved in the logistics, information-related, sale promotion, insurance agency, etc. business, as well as provides environmental and hygiene-related products. The Nisshin OilliO Group,Ltd. was incorporated in 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
